name: places/ChIJbW5Yf7tZwokRBvQ-6QxeQSw
formattedAddress: 211 W 20th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 211 W 20th St, New York, NY 10011-3501, USA

originalText.text: My shoot with Leslie was wonderful.  She has an artistic eye while providing all you need to get outstanding photos that come to life.  Her professionalism carries through every aspect of the shoot.  She helps but don't hold your hand.  She is my new "go-to" photographer.  Excellent.  Worth it in every way!

text.text: My shoot with Leslie was wonderful.  She has an artistic eye while providing all you need to get outstanding photos that come to life.  Her professionalism carries through every aspect of the shoot.  She helps but don't hold your hand.  She is my new "go-to" photographer.  Excellent.  Worth it in every way!

originalText.text: Leslie is a delight to work with.  Her head shots focus on the type of roles you will be seeking.  She has a gift.  Leslie's make up artist Juliette is excellent. Great team work.  They are the best!  Bill

text.text: Leslie is a delight to work with.  Her head shots focus on the type of roles you will be seeking.  She has a gift.  Leslie's make up artist Juliette is excellent. Great team work.  They are the best!  Bill

originalText.text:
With all of the options available out there, it is crucial that one chooses the photographer that is perfect for both them and their objective.   As is true in most areas, there are always a very select few who truly stand out amongst the vast crowd.  Leslie is one of those unique, rare gems.   With her extensive experience, keen knowledge of current industry and fashion trends ...and list of A-List celebrities to working models and business execs, Leslie has that uncanny ability to make one feel confident, completely relaxed and as though they are the center of the universe.   That distinctive ability has no choice but to bring out the best "you" which will surely be reflected in your photos that will stun.

My session was not only productive and professional but it was fun and exciting.   She shot both in the studio and outside.   Believe it or not, she took so many awesome photos, I had trouble narrowing it down but Leslie took the time to help me do so.

Leslie also brings with her a team of professionals (makeup artists, retouchers) who, in my opinion, are the absolute best in their field.

So, if you are looking for amazing photos that truly bring out the essence and "star" within you, the choice is clear.   I have worked with world-class photographers and I'm telling you, Leslie is IT!

originalText.text: I had a wonderful experience working with Leslie and her hair/makeup artist, Juliet. Leslie's communication prior to the shoot was amazing! We worked together to help create the looks I was going for. The vibe during the shoot was very upbeat and positive. She helped direct me and made me feel comfortable and confident. Juliet was also there to touch up my make up and hair along the way. I'm very pleased with how my headshots turned out. I'm still having trouble narrowing them down! I highly recommend her!

text.text: I had a wonderful experience working with Leslie and her hair/makeup artist, Juliet. Leslie's communication prior to the shoot was amazing! We worked together to help create the looks I was going for. The vibe during the shoot was very upbeat and positive. She helped direct me and made me feel comfortable and confident. Juliet was also there to touch up my make up and hair along the way. I'm very pleased with how my headshots turned out. I'm still having trouble narrowing them down! I highly recommend her!

originalText.text:
My friend told me not to be intimidated by Leslie’s client list. “There’s a lot of pretty famous and influential people on there,” she said, herself a fairly famous and influential person. “Your photos are dull. You need someone who can get who you are into a headshot.” I checked out Leslie’s gallery (yep, lots of famous humans there), took a deep breath and made an appointment. And of course it’s the best thing I’ve done for my career in ten years.

If you look at my photos in the order they were taken, you can watch the scared little bunny who starts the session grow shot by shot into Robert freakin Redford. Leslie has a brilliant way of getting you to believe that her camera is falling for you, frame by frame. She works with you like the best directors, building a character and a moment with you for every look so that you’re acting for her camera (what we do best, right?) instead of just posing for it (terrifying!). The worst days of my career were spent getting headshots made, and I know it showed. But it broke my heart a little bit when Leslie said we were done, and the results blew my mind (my agent’s as well).

Who knows, maybe if I had found Leslie a decade ago, I’d be thanking her in an Oscar speech. (I guess there’s still time…). In the meantime, thank you, Leslie for making me look interesting. Thank you thank you thank you!
